DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate non-inferiority Belotero® Basic versus Juvéderm® Ultra 3 treatment nasolabial fold
DOC.brief_title: Non-inferiority Belotero® Basic Versus Juvéderm® Ultra 3
DOC.criteria: Subject bilateral , symmetrical NLF wish correction . Documented severity NLF score 2 3 screen Merz Wrinkle Severity Rating Scale II Any severe uncontrolled systemic disease ( e.g . cardiac , renal , pulmonary , hepatic , gastrointestinal ) . Subject suffer diabetes mellitus , autoimmune rheumatic disease , clinically relevant coagulation disorder , recurrent angina , severe psychic , neurological mental disease History malignancy within last 5 year study Infection , inflammation active dermatological disease face
